WorkItem.Description:
The scope that is not listed in the current beta is the gnomish x-ray scope. 
http://www.wowhead.com/item=59594  
"Use: Attaches a permanent scope to a bow or gun that sometimes increases ranged attack power by 800 for 10 sec when dealing damage with ranged attacks."

Comments.Message: The enchant is in the system. It could very well be a relevancy issue.
The enchant probably doesn't have the right trigger set on it.

Well currently in the system, I have set up as 800 RangedAttackPower, 10% chance on RangedHit, for 10 seconds with a 45 second cd. Now the 45 second CD can probably be set to 50 second cd since On Equip trinkets are running as 5 times the length of the duration (10 second duration * 5 = 50 second ICD). But I don't know if that applies to this enchant or not (I'm thinking it does).
It probably does and RangedHit I guess is the right trigger for it. Zhok, can you take a look at this when you get settled in?
This enchant is currently listed under the "Back" slot, not the "Ranged" slot - could be why people can't find it.  Seems to be itemized correctly though.
